      • find

        public Signoff.Signatory find(java.lang.String name)
        Locate a signatory by name.

      • add

        public Signoff.Signatory add(WorkItem item)
        Add an empty signatory entry for the work item. This is what you normally call to build the Signatory list.

        Note that multiple work items assigned to the same identity are allowed, which also means they have to sign twice. This can be caused by work item forwarding.

      • finish

        public Signoff.Signatory finish(WorkItem item)
        Assimilate a completed signoff work item.

      • getPendingSignoffs

        public int getPendingSignoffs()
        Return the number of signoffs still pending.
